title: Product Manager, Discover Product Experience
description: At Google, we put our users first. The world is always changing, so we need Product Managers who are continuously adapting and excited to work on products that affect millions of people every day.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience. 6 years of experience in product management. Experience with consumer Internet products. Experience developing or launching products or technologies within AI/ML or a related area.
preferred_qualifications: Experience creating product roadmaps from conception to launch, driving the product goals, defining the go-to-market strategy, and leading design discussions. Experience building the front-end, User Interface features and components of feed-based consumer experiences. Experience with hypothesis-driven A/B testing. Experience developing or launching products or technologies within AI/ML or a related area. Ability to make data-driven decisions.
responsibilities: Define and develop a compelling goal for the entire product life-cycle of Homestack widgets. Understand user information needs and launch helpful widgets to provide that information in an at-a-glance experience. Establish the process for partner teams (e.g., Search Verticals) to build on new Homestack widgets that solve for various user information needs. Build and manage the Homestack widget roadmap, establishing goals, managing priorities, and providing technical leadership for long term direction. Define and develop a strategy for providing users with agency and control over the Discover content, aligned with the partner teams.
